definition: embalmment and drying a dead body and wrapping it as a mummy
details:
noun
- embalmment and drying a dead body and wrapping it as a mummy
- (pathology) gangrene that develops in the presence of arterial obstruction and is characterized by dryness of the dead tissue and a dark brown color
= synonyms: dry gangrene, cold gangrene, mumification necrosis
- a condition resembling that of a mummy
= example: a condition resembling that of a mummy
